attributes.action: Freeze MP salaries and income tax as a gesture of apology for the recent claims scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see MP's salaries frozen for a short period, say three months, and freeze income tax to the working public ina gesture to recoup money we have earned that has paid for the gardeners, decorating and other shambolic expenses claims recently brought to light. We need, as a nation a gesture of goodwill in these critical times to try and help us, the public, dig ourselves out of financial ruin.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
